name: Polyphemus
description: Polyphemus (Greek: Πολύφημος) was the original cyclops from the Odyssey of Homer. He appears in God of War: Ascension’s multiplayer mode as the boss of the desert map. He does not appear in the singleplayer campaign. Polyphemus is the gigantic one-eyed Titan son of Poseidon and Sea Nymph, Thoosa.
